title: Ultrahigh power generation from low-frequency and micro motion by suppressing air breakdown
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5002-5012
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01119H, Paper
Zeyuan Cao, Junchi Teng, Rong Ding, Jiani Xu, Chao Ren, Seng-Hong Lee, Xingqi Guo, Xiongying Ye
This work reports a novel and standard metric of plot to evaluate the electrostatic generator's output performance under air breakdown limitation and proposes a strategy to extend the plot for achieving ultrahigh power generation.
